name: Divide & Rule - PvP # 1 strategy puzzle game
name_original: Divide & Rule - PvP # 1 strategy puzzle game
description:
The Order awaits your command!
Guide your army through the hoard of monsters.
Free the unknown lands and never be forgotten in Island Kingdom as the Commander-in-Chief.
Island Kingdom is an addicting turn-based brain teaser! Take over as much of the map as you can and never give in to the enemy!
Think two steps ahead of the enemy and always come out on top!
Features:
PvP gameplay online against real people
Challenge your friends on the same device
Use powerful abilities
Test your skills in hundreds of mind-boggling levels
Have fun battling in a tech fantasy world!
